Package org.group8.simulator.framework

Interface IHealthCentre

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractHealthCentre, HealthCentre
public interface IHealthCentre
The IHealthCentre interface defines the methods that must be implemented by any class representing a health center in the simulation. It allows the controller to interact with the simulation by setting parameters, controlling the simulation flow, and retrieving statistics.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    getDelay()
    Gets the delay between simulation steps.
    double
    getSimulationTime()
    Gets the total simulation time set for the health center.

    Retrieves the current simulation statistics, including patient flow and timing data.

    Checks if the simulation is currently running.
    void
    pauseThread()
    Pauses the simulation thread.
    void
    resumeThread()
    Resumes the simulation thread if it is paused.
    void
    setDelay(long time)
    Sets the delay between simulation steps to control the simulation speed.
    void
    setSimulationTime(double time)
    Sets the total simulation time for the health center.

    • setSimulationTime

      void setSimulationTime(double time)
      Sets the total simulation time for the health center.
      Parameters:
      time - the total simulation time

    • getSimulationTime

      double getSimulationTime()
      Gets the total simulation time set for the health center.
      Returns:
      the total simulation time

    • setDelay

      void setDelay(long time)
      Sets the delay between simulation steps to control the simulation speed.
      Parameters:
      time - the delay time in milliseconds

    • getDelay

      long getDelay()
      Gets the delay between simulation steps.
      Returns:
      the delay time in milliseconds

    • getStatistics

      String getStatistics()
      Retrieves the current simulation statistics, including patient flow and timing data.
      Returns:
      a string containing the simulation statistics

    • pauseThread

      void pauseThread()
      Pauses the simulation thread.

    • resumeThread

      void resumeThread()
      Resumes the simulation thread if it is paused.

    • isRunning

      boolean isRunning()
      Checks if the simulation is currently running.
      Returns:
      true if the simulation is running, false if it is paused
